video.title: Find Yourself
video.synopsis: A determined entrepreneur navigates a love triangle between a young charmer and an older executive, leading her down an unconventional path to love.

episodes.synopsis: Lacking experience in love, an executive director in her ‘30s reconnects with a man from her past and deals with a young employee at her firm.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: After an emotional meeting with an agency executive, He Fanxing’s dynamic with Yuan Song begins to shift.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Fanxing gets caught in a dilemma with Ye Luming then sets an example for Yuan Song. A friend later offers to set her up on a date.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Fanxing shares a vulnerable moment with her friends. Luming makes a sweet gesture. He Canyang bares his heart in front of an unexpected audience.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: During a storm, an emotional downpour ensues as Yuan Song makes his feelings clear to Fanxing, who seizes an opportunity to return the sentiment.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: A blind date makes Fanxing see a familiar face differently as Yuan Song awaits her response to a burning question. Luming accepts a challenge.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Determined to win over their love interests, Luming and his niece plot separate strategies. Yuan Song makes Fanxing an interesting proposal.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Yuan Song's social media post raises suspicions about his new girlfriend as Fanxing looks to establish clear boundaries. Luming has a dog crisis.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Gossip about Fanxing's relationship reaches her family as she tries to keep her office romance a secret.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: An admirer pays Yuan Song a visit, sparking Fanxing's jealousy. At the mall, Luming asks He Fanxing for advice as Canyang runs into Cai Minmin.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Luming gives a surprising gift. A badminton match between Fanxing and Yuan Song heats up. Cong Xiao asks Fanxing for a favor.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: After an insightful talk with Cong Xiao, Fanxing questions Luming's romantic intentions. Luming spots Fanxing and a young man at the market.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: At a wedding, Fanxing is interrogated about her relationship. News about the company starts to spread. Luming warms up to a stranger at the park.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: When Fanxing loses a special necklace, a friend steps into help. Rumors at school land Cai Minmin in a tough position.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Yuan Song and Fanxing scramble to keep their relationship under wraps. Cai Minmin knocks on Yuan Song's door while Fanxing's cleaning the place.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Yuan Song tells Fanxing he intends to give up the internship so they can announce their relationship. Fanxing attempts to set up Luming on a date.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: News about management changes at Fanxing's company throws her career into question. Canyang's girlfriend accosts him and Fanxing on the street.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Cong Xiao gets tangled in a conflict with her client's wife, but Chang Huan comes to her aid. Fanxing and Yuan Song enjoy a romantic date.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Yuan Song is reluctant to tell Fanxing about his study abroad plans. Fanxing's school frenemy attempts to embarrass her about her relationship status.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Fanxing sees her boss meet with Luming's friend. Yuan Song learns that Luming attended a gathering with Fanxing's class representatives.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: As speculation grows between Fanxing and Yuan Song, Cong Xiao confronts Fanxing about Luming. Fanxing then makes a heartbreaking decision.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: He Canyang stumbles upon a secret letter in Fanxing's room. Fanxing and Luming go on an outing.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Ye Luming shows up at Fanxing's parents' place. Yuan Song prepares to leave the company. Cong Xiao and Fanxing have a heart-to-heart about love.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Cai Minmin tells Yuan Song she's related to Luming. Yuan Song suspects that Luming stood between him and Fanxing.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: As Luming continues to pursue Fanxing, Wu Meiyin makes Yuan Song a deal to help him win back Fanxing's heart.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Luming enlists Fanxing's help in warding off his matchmaking sister. Cai Minmin misinterprets Song Xue and He Canyang's relationship.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Yuan Song asks Fanxing to remain friends and puts his plan in motion. He Canyang tries to convince Cai Minmin to stay in school.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Song Xue debates whether to tell Xiaoyu about Shen Fanfan's affair. At Song Yifan's dinner party, Fanxing makes a surprising discovery about Yuan Song.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Yuan Song explains to Fanxing why he never revealed his father's identity. Song Yifan asks Fanxing to look after Yuan Song.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: He Canyang and Cai Minmin hide their relationship from Luming. A hospital visit gives Fanxing and Yuan Song a chance to spend time together.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Song Xue receives an incriminating photo of Shen Fanfan and a paramour. Yuan Song bonds with his dad.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: Amid social media chatter, Song Xue and Fanxing pursue the truth about Shen Fanfan. Xiaoyu faces an impossible dilemma.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: Wu Meiyin and Fanxing discuss matters of the heart. Yuan Song confesses his true feelings to Fanxing.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: Fanxing resigns from the company. Song Xue and Fanxing offer to support Xiaoyu in her divorce. Fanxing's dad goes missing.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: On the heels of her dad's diagnosis, Fanxing overhears her parents discuss her future. Cai Minmin finds out about Yuan Song and Fanxing's past.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: Fanxing's parents meet Luming's family. He Canyang's relationship is no longer a secret. Song Yifan gives Luming an ultimatum.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Fanxing is irked to see Yuan Song with his new colleague. He Canyang's mom catches him and Cai Minmin in an awkward embrace.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: Luming and Fanxing's relationship arrives at a crossroads. Yuan Song realizes Fanxing is jealous of Luo Wenyue.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: As her dad's condition worsens, Fanxing becomes torn between love and family duty. Luming makes a difficult decision.
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: Fanxing tells her parents the truth about her past with Yuan Song and sets out to win him back.
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: Fanxing informs Yuan Song of her decision, but he's not convinced. Song Xue receives a pleasant surprise. Xiaoyu turns over a new leaf.
episodes.title: Episode 41
